Message:
Humans are selfish creatures.
In one whimsical moment,
they worship me as a god,

and the next, they attempt to
exterminate me as a mononoke.

That was what I had thought...
but he seems to be slightly
different from the ones I know.

simply far too weak!
Not even a match for the horn
of a tiny rhinoceros beetle!

Despite that, he always
sticks his nose into trouble,
helping anyone in need...

But, everyone he helps
have naught but smiles.

Even those who are angry or sad...
they all smile when he does,
as if being drawn in by his charm...

Good grief, every last one of them
is being tricked.

...Well, I will not be tricked.
Just you wait, human.

I shall tear away
your sheep’s clothing,
and unveil your true,
filthy nature for all to see!

Now that my mind is set...
’tis time to prepare at once~!
